page.title: 04Entertainment in Mayland-sea
page.content:
Live{music}is provided, by a duo at The Virginian each Sunday evening. A disc-jockey with disco and food is given regularly at the Mayland Mill- in summer this includes a barbeque. In a special{children's room}a {family disco}with food is held weekly at the Mayland Mill. The local Family Centre holds a Coffee and Swop Shop on Wednesday mornings. The Mayland Mill caters for{Hen {Nights-}with free champagne for the bride also for{Wedding Receptions. There are two{public halls}in the area which are available for hire,though in practice the are rarely used except for the Harvest Supper and the occasional Fayre.
- . -
